# SCNHitTestSearchMode.any

**Case**

The hit test should return only the first object found, regardless of distance.

## Declaration

```swift
case any
```

## Search Modes

- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.all**: The hit test should return all possible results, sorted from nearest to farthest.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.closest**: The hit test should return only the closes object found.
